lv.lumii.layoutengine

Class OutsideLabel.LineLabel

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    OutsideLabel

    public static class OutsideLabel.LineLabel
extends OutsideLabel
    A class for line outside labels.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OutsideLabel.LineLabel.Orientation
      This enumeration defines the options for limiting on which side of their line can labels be placed.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrientation

        public OutsideLabel.LineLabel.Orientation getOrientation()
        Returns the orientation of this line label. The orientation is a parameter which defines on which side of the line the label should be placed.
        Returns:
        the orientation of this line label

      • setOrientation

        public void setOrientation(OutsideLabel.LineLabel.Orientation orientation)
        Sets the orientation of this line label. The orientation is a parameter which defines on which side of the line the label should be placed.
        Parameters:
        orientation - the new orientation of this line label

      • getRotationAngle

        public double getRotationAngle()
        Returns the clockwise rotation angle for this label if this label is to be rotated. Otherwise returns 0. Labels for orthogonal lines are never rotated (the method also returns 0).
        Returns:
        the angle this label should be rotated clockwise.

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(boolean state)
        Sets whether to rotate this label. Labels for orthogonal lines are never rotated, even if this is set to true.
        Parameters:
        state - the rotation state of the label.

      • isRotated

        public boolean isRotated()
        Returns whether the label is rotated.Labels for orthogonal lines are never rotated, even if this method returns true.
        Returns:
        whether the label is rotated.

      • getOwner

        public Line getOwner()
        Description copied from class: Element
        Each element can be owned by some other element. When an owner is deleted, it deletes all objects owned by it. A box's owner is a container (or one of its derived classes â€” another box or diagram), a line is owned by a container. A label is owned by a box, a line, a label or a container. Container's owner is a container. A diagram is not owned by any other element.
        Overrides:
        getOwner in class Element
        Returns:
        the owner of this object, or possibly null, if this element is a diagram.

      • setAutoFlip

        public void setAutoFlip(boolean state)
        Description copied from class: OutsideLabel
        Sets the auto flip parameter for this label. If auto flip is set, then the label will be always flipped sideways (its width and height swapped) when placed on a vertical segment, so that it always runs along the segment (unless OutsideLabel.flipped is set, in which case this ensures the label always runs perpendicular to the segment).
        Specified by:
        setAutoFlip in class OutsideLabel
        Parameters:
        state - whether to set or unset the auto flip parameter

      • move

        public void move(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point,
                 Line line)
        Moves this label to the given point on the given line. If the point is not on the line, first moves the point onto the line.
        Parameters:
        point - the point where to move this label
        line - the line on which to place this label

      • move

        public void move(double position,
                 Line line)
        Moves this label to the given relative position on the given line.
        Parameters:
        position - the relative position where to place this label on the line (should be between 0 and 1, inclusive)
        line - the line on which to place this label
